item.title: Installing Arch linux on WSL
item.description: Install Arch linux under WSL is quite straightforward. Head over to ArchWsl and download the latest version Extract the file Launch a terminal (I highly recommend windows terminal) cd into the location of the arch.

item.title: Running arch with i3 in wsl using vcxsrv
item.description: The goal of this post is to show a minimal configuration to run i3 in Arch linux under WSL using vcxsrv.
